description:
Excellent for the loose, muddy conditions of aggressive all-mountain riding. The tread incorporates ramped knobs for low rolling resistance, and channel-cut knobs to add edge grip. It adds up to straight-line control and precise cornering. Pair it with a Minion DHR2 in the back for the ultimate aggressive trail riding tire setup!

  • 3C Maxx Terra soft compound offers traction, good tread wear, and less rolling resistance than Maxx Grip
  • EXO+ protection reduces the chances of punctures and sidewall cutting
  • Wide trail spacing is optimized for 35mm inner width rims
  • Tubeless-ready
name: Maxxis Minion DHF 27.5in. TR 3C Maxx Terra EXO+ Folding Tire
